author: Neverest
title: Blame Me
text: Sitting here telling myself that she was wrong
Didn't understand she said it was what it was
Should have had it figured out but i played along
My love for you wasn't the only one
Everything is changing leaving like it was before
And i ain't welcoming when she come through the door
I keep my distance when she climb up into bed
My heart had been shattered yet again
And i go on with my day playing like i'm okay
But the pain won't ever stop (stop it!)
How did i go along without knowing what was going on
How could you say it was all of my fault
Then go ahead, blame me
If that's what you need to do
Go ahead, blame me
It's really not me, it's you
How could you, blame me
When all i gave was everything for you
You're up and down
You're in and out
You can't hold me down
Baby you're the one to blame
Just stop it
Just stop
You're quick to tell me i don't kiss you like before
Or send you messages, i'll wait to be ignored
Why's it so hard for you to look me in the eyes
Is this on one other side
There just ain't something right about the situation
I can hear it in your voice, i hear the hesitation
Would you walk away and never wanna talk about it
It's all because of you
And i go on with my day playing like i'm okay
But the pain won't ever stop (stop it!)
How did i go along without knowing what was going on
How could you say it was all of my fault
Go ahead, blame me
If that's what you need to do
Go ahead, blame me
It's really not me, it's you
How could you, blame me
When all i gave was everything for you
You're up and down
You're in and out
You can't hold me down
Baby, you're the one to blame
I didn't wanna say i was over it
Cause i ain't over it, i ain't over it
How could you tell me now
That your mind is set
Love me, hate me, blame me
I'm gonna do it
(love me, hate me, blame me)
If that's what you need to do
I'm gonna do it
(love me, hate me, blame me)
If that's what you need
If that's what you need
Blame me, if that's what you need to do
Then go ahead and blame me
It's really not me, it's you
How could you, blame me
When all i gave was everything to you
You're up and down, you're in and out
You can't hold me down
Baby, you're the one to blame
Just stop it
Just stop it
Just stop

author: Neverest
title: Hate It
text: Tell me who's the one to blame for what i'm feeling
Tell me what am i supposed to do
Tell me when, when i'll be free from your love spell
Tell me why, tell me why it hurts so good
It's hard to control how i love you too much
All of me, all of the time
Cause baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
I finally said it and i don't regret it
Baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
I don't wanna say it, i'm infatuated
With the beat of your heart
With the kiss of your lips
With the look that you give with your eyes
And baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
And i don't know why
Tell me who, who else could care for you like i do
Tell me what to do to get to you
Tell me when your heart will beat for me, i'm waiting
Tell me why, tell me why it hurts so good
It's hard to control how i love you too much
All of me, all of the time
Cause baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
I finally said it and i don't regret it
Baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
I don't wanna say it, i'm infatuated
With the beat of your heart
With the kiss of your lips
With the look that you give with your eyes
And baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
And i don't know why
On top of the world
On top of the world
Is where you'll find me
On top of the world
On top of the world
If you were by my side
On top of the world
On top of the world
Is where you'll take me
Without you i ain't going, no
Without you i ain't right
Cause baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
I finally said it and i don't regret it
Baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
I don't wanna say it, i'm infatuated
With the beat of your heart
With the kiss of your lips
With the look that you give with your eyes
And baby i hate it, i hate it, i hate it
And i don't know why

author: Neverest
title: Hello/Goodbye
text: You try to tell me it mattered, but you've proven otherwise
Your promises have shattered, and even turned to lies
And when i feel the hurting, i sent an sos
It's like you never heard it, we just can't make it
You revealed your it, when you looked into my eyes and start your lies
And i couldn't see it (i couldn't see it)
You took me by, you took me by surprise.
Cuz i don't believe it, and no other part of me thats safe from you has died
Cuz you left me, you left me, you left me, so hello and good bye
Whoever thought that it'd come to this, i never had a clue
It's come to me as a real surprise, as i'm sure it has for you
And when i feel the hurting, i sent an sos
It's like you never heard it, we just can't make it
You revealed your it, when you looked into my eyes and start your lies
And i couldn't see it (i couldn't see it)
You took me by, you took me by surprise.
Cuz i don't believe it, and no other part of me thats safe from you has died
Cuz you left me, you left me, you left me, so hello and good bye
You came and took what you wanted, you left me with nothing at all
I'm a fool to think i can make it, did you enjoy watching me fall?
Did you feel, feeling anything, is that why you were so cold?
How could you make me the enemy, for loving you from my soul?
You revealed your it, when you looked into my eyes and start your lies
And i couldn't see it (i couldn't see it)
You took me by, you took me by surprise.
Cuz i don't believe it, and no other part of me thats safe from you has died
Cuz you left me, you left me, you left me, so hello and good bye

author: Neverest
title: The Chase
text: Packed up my things
Midnight I'm leaving
Chasing my dreams
Will you follow?
Ridding the highway
One stop to Broadway
Little too late to look back
You know that I might gone forever
Is forever to soon?
Don't leave it up to fate to be together
And I'll be there waiting for you
She may meet somebody better
She may need more
More than I've got
She may leave me forever
It's the chance that I'm taking
With all that I've got
She may leave
If I bought you that house
By the Hollywood hillside
Maybe a suite in the city
Would you think twice
Or have you already made up your mind (Mind)
What would it take to be near me
You know that I might gone forever
Is forever to soon?
Don't leave it up to fate to be together
And I'll be there waiting for you
(I'll be there waiting)
She may meet somebody better
She may need more
More than I've got
She may leave me forever
It's the chance that I'm taking
With all that I've got
Hey, I don't feel the same
Everything was strange
It's taking me over the edge
I'm torn between two loves
Send the prayers above
It's killing me
That she may
That she may need
(More than I've got)
(More than I've got)
She may meet somebody better
She may need more
More than I've got
(She may leave)
She may leave me forever
It's the chance that I'm taking
With all that I've got
It's the chance that I'm taking
With all that I've got
She may leave
